title: DeluxeMenu配合Ess出现bug
author: youngklps
txt_content:
help.png (5.65 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-7-8 11:15 上传




deluxemenu配合PAPI和ESS,使用如下代码,该礼包冷却已经完成了,菜单页面依然显示冷却0,求教如何解决?

      '1':
        material: BEACON
        slot: 0
        priority: 2
        enchantments:
        - DURABILITY;1
        hide_enchantments: true
        display_name: '&6每日礼包!'
        view_requirement: '"%essentials_kit_is_available_online%".equalsIgnoreCase("yes")'
        expression: '"%essentials_kit_is_available_online%".equalsIgnoreCase("yes")'
        lore:
        - '&a高级道具组合包,内含半小时飞行时间.'
        left_click_commands:
        - '[player] kit online'
        - '[console] tf give %player_name% -m 30'
        right_click_commands:
        - '[player] kit online'
        - '[console] tf give %player_name% -m 30'
      '11':
        material: BEACON
        slot: 0
        priority: 1
        display_name: '&6每日礼包&c[冷却中]'
        lore:
        - '&7请再等待 &c%essentials_kit_time_until_available_online%'
        left_click_commands:
        - '[message] &c真坏，冷却了还点我~'
        right_click_commands:
        - '[message] &c真坏，冷却了还点我~'

replies.author: youngklps
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-7-8 11:22
这个扩展装了吗
https://api.extendedclip.com/expansions/essentials/
装了,该装的我都装了.
